author: Kate O'Flaherty
title: Apple, Google, and Microsoft Just Patched Some Spooky Security Flaws
description: Plus: Major vulnerability fixes are now available for a number of enterprise giants, including Cisco, VMWare, Citrix, and SAP.
content:
Another scary flaw in the System tracked as CVE-2023-40129 is rated as critical. The [vulnerability] could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed, Google said.
